title: (Request) Arena Mode
body:
A small map with no turrets, minions or fountain.
Players start at lvl 18 with any items.
The two teams vs each other in rounds, with each team win/loss counting for a point.

replies.body: I like the sound of that, but champs such as Karthus would probably need to be permanently banned. It'd be one big wombo combo fest :D
